page.title: 17A Day In My Life
page.content: I normally get up at half past seven and get dressed.About eight o'clock I get my breakfast of Frosties and milk.then I pack my schoolbag and get my bus money ready.At half past eight my friend Sheran and I walk up to the bus stop.The bus comes around ten to nine.School starts at 9.15a.m. and continues until 3.l0 p.m. In the morning we do spellings,Religious Education, mental arithmetic and mathematics. We have a ten minute break during the morning. After break we do English, Geography, Natural Science or History. As a member of the school choir we meet every Wednesday afternoon. About two o'clock, as a school prefect, I help escort the primary children to the school bus. The school day ends at ten past three.
